Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: '"Static Seal". That is how I will cure the Punishing Virus.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'Every single sand carries millions of these "Static Seal" nanobots.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'They flow with the wind and suppress the Punishing Virus in the air.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Then I'm not needed here.", 3: '9', 4: "Sounds to me like you've figured out how to save the world.", 5: '9'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'You are not wrong... To completely reclaim Earth and cure the virus... we will need to set up Golden Vortexes all over the planet.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'As you can see, I have already built this one with my own resources.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'Combining the technological prowess and armed troops of Babylonia, we can speed up their construction while making sure they are protected.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'And you, Commandant, are the key to my conversation with Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'You come with certain freedom within the hierarchy of the political powers of Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'If you can present the Golden Vortex to the Science Council, I guarantee you they will be impressed by my design!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'From what I know of the Council, they probably have tried this already.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'Enough! That is all I have to say.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'You have a brief window to consider, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'Now, excuse me... There is something trivial I have to take care of.', 4: '1'}
